author: tobrien
msg: Fixed a rendering problem with the example code in the tutorial page.  In the example of embedding Jelly, there were bold tags within the preformatted Java code - Maven's site generation was adding newlines around these bolded variable names.  These bold tags were removed, and all code examples now have indentation.

author: proyal
msg: [JELLY-69] Test to make sure ContentHandler is an XMLWriter before casting

author: proyal
msg: [JELLY-64] Remove maven POM inheritance to simply project checkouts

author: proyal
msg: Remove ant build scripts since they are not maintained
